divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in the kitchen with my father and 2 children while my husband and brother were working outside. I gave my son something to drink and he made a funny face that I took a picture of. I went outside to show my husband the picture and as I was about to walk away, he yelled, "Whoa!". I spun around as fast as I could and I seen what looked like a spherical bright white light jet from one side of the sky to the other. It then stopped, did a little zigzag pattern and disappeared upwards. I turned and looked at my husband and said, "Did we just see a UFO?" And he said, "I think we did."
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: looked up and seen a big white orb of light jet across the sky stop and then zigzag upwards then disappear
trends: There has been one other sighting in Lawrenceburg
There were no other sightings in Lawrenceburg on or around March 23rd 2012
